pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tools for Working with Recurrence Rules // Provides tools for defining recurrence rules and recurrence sets. Recurrence rules are a programmatic way to define a recurring event, like the first Monday of December. Multiple recurrence rules can be combined into larger recurrence sets. A full holiday and calendar interface is also provided that can generate holidays within a particular year, can detect if a date is a holiday, can respect holiday observance rules, and allows for custom holidays.
